text: moosa ne kaha, "hamaare rab! toone firaun aur usake saradaaron ko saansaarik jeevan mein shobha-saamagree aur dhan die hai, hamaare rab, isalie ki ve tere maarg se bhatakaen! hamaare rab, unake dhan nasht kar de aur unake hrday kathor kar de ki ve eemaan na laen, taaki ve dukhad yaatana dekh len.
